Kill the Emperor and become The Absolute, in the name of Bhaal

Ending Requirements and Conditions:

Choose to Claim the Absolute in the name of Bhaal. Kill the Emperor. Must have The Dark Urge origins.

How to Obtain Ending:

This section is currently a WIP.

ENDING DESCRIPTION

This ending is specific to The Dark Urge
